channel.title: Emoji on pabloscloud
channel.description: Recent content in Emoji on pabloscloud

item.title: Tweemoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways. In this theme, you can use Twemoji kit simply writing emoji and then adding this param in the config.toml file. twemoji = true More info in the theme wiki on Github.
